formatted_address: 820 Thomson Rd, Mt Alvernia Hospital, #07-59, Medical Centre D, Singapore 574623
name: The Pain Clinic @ Alvernia

reviews.text:
We are incredibly grateful to Dr. Ho for his expertise and care in treating our daughter, who had been suffering from persistent nerve pain in the elbow since 2022. Despite multiple consultations with a pain specialist at a public hospital and being prescribed medication, we were never given a clear diagnosis and treatment plan.

Through a recommendation from the ward staff, we were referred to Dr. Ho — and we’re so thankful we followed through. During our very first consultation, Dr. Ho was able to accurately diagnose her condition as Cubital Tunnel Syndrome. His patience in listening to our concerns, and his clear explanation of the condition and treatment options, gave us much-needed clarity and confidence on the way forward.

Dr Ho has made a difficult journey much easier for our daughter, and we highly recommend him to anyone in need of a knowledgeable and caring specialist.

Dr Diana is an excellent pain physician. She provides genuine care and solutions for my lower back pain that has affected me deeply. She offered treatment at various points of my medical ailment and respect my wishes to choose. She does not impose her views but will list out the pros and cons of each treatment and let me decide. Her empathic nature and deep understanding of pain allows her to provide the best care for her patients. Thank you Dr Diana.

I’ve experienced numbness in my upper arm for the past 2-3 year. Dr Diana has been very professional and patient with me, taking care to explain the findings and options. It’s been a great journey thus far. Thank you, Dr Diana, for alleviating my issues.

Experienced pain in my lower body for a few months which did not improve after a couple of visits to the GPs. Subsequently, went to Dr Diana and she was able to diagnose the root cause (degenerating and slipped disc) and recommend treatments to prevent the pain from affecting my daily life. Felt safe in her care and got treated with nerve root injection and pulse radiofrequency. Would definitely recommend Dr Diana.

I was treated by Dr Diana for my sacroiliac joint pain. She and her staff were patient in explaining the solutions for my pain management. After the treatment, it helped to significantly reduced my pain. I would highly recommend Dr Diana and her team for pain management treatments!

vicinity: 820 Thomson Rd, Mt Alvernia Hospital, #07-59, Medical Centre D
